LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftBearClaws.label: Human Implant: bear claws
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftBearClaws.descriptio: Craft bear claws, a hybrid implant containing humanoid and bear DNA that adds a powerful melee attack.
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftDiggingBearClaws.des: Craft digging mole claws, grotesque but powerful hand blades that have been modified to be used in mining operations, increasing both speed and yield.
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftBearMuscleTissue.des: Craft bear muscle tissue, a hybrid implant containing humanoid and bear DNA that adds strength and stamina.
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftHibernationModule.de: Craft hibernation module, a biochip that modifies the brain to reduce the need for sleep.
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftOvipositor.label: Human Implant: ovipositor
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftOvipositor.descripti: Craft an ovipositor, a hybrid implant containing humanoid and chicken DNA that... are you sure this is a good idea? Really? Free range human eggs? Ugh...
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftMuffaloMuscles.label: Human Implant: muffalo muscles
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftMuffaloMuscles.descr: Craft muffalo muscles, a hybrid implant containing humanoid and muffalo DNA that strengthens the subject's muscular system.
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftMuffaloMammaries.des: By implanting muffalo mammaries into a colonist... Wait, what??? Who came up with this idea????? Anyway... this implant allows your colonist to be milked... What the...
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftMuffaloSkin.label: Human Implant: muffalo skin
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftMuffaloSkin.descript: Craft muffalo skin, a synthetic skin substitute that is much thicker and a much better insulator than human skin. This provides a measure of defense but, more importantly, makes the subject more resistant to low temperatures.
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftBoomalopeNodules.des: Craft boomalope nodules, a hybrid implant containing humanoid and boomalope DNA that causes a huge explosion if the subject dies violently.
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftChemfuelStomach.desc: Craft chemfuel stomach, a reinforced bionic stomach that uses a combination of gastric acid and chemfuel to efficiently digest food.
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftChemfuelHeart.label: Human Implant: chemfuel heart
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftChemfuelHeart.descri: Craft chemfuel heart, a reinforced bionic heart that acts like a miniature 4-stroke internal combustion engine powered by chemfuel to pump blood through the body.
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftWolfMuscularFibers.d: Craft wolf muscular fibers, which can modify the subject's legs by weaving hybrid human/wolf muscle fibers within the base tissue, giving her a significant strength and speed boost.
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftDevouringJaws.label: Human Implant: devouring jaws
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftDevouringJaws.descri: Craft devouring jaws, a set of improved teeth designed to rapidly chew and ingest any kind of food. Leaves kind of a mess, though...
Craft neuron reinforcement. A biochip using animal stem cells to reinforce the natural abilities of human neurons, increasing learning and research speed.
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftMousePheromones.desc: Craft mouse pheromones, a bionic vomeronasal organ that allows the subject pheromonal communication with other animals, increasing the chance of taming and training them successfully.
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftMoleratNerveDampener: Craft mole-rat nerve dampener, a biochip that reduces pain sensitivity, allowing the subject to survive pain shock.
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftBunnyEars.label: Human Implant: bunny ear
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftBunnyEars.descriptio: Craft bunny ear. This huge leporid ear gives amazing enhanced hearing. Also, super kawaii!
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftCompoundEye.label: Human Implant: compound eye
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftCompoundEye.descript: Craft compound eye. This hybrid humanoid / insectoid eye provides improved vision in a wide range of different wavelengths, including those usually outside the human range, completely modifying the way the subject perceives his surroundings.
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftCatEye.label: Human Implant: cat eye
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftCatEye.description: Craft cat eye. This hybrid humanoid / feline eye provides improved night vision, at the expense of a certain short-sightedness outside and during the day. Ideal for nyctophile colonists.
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftInsectoidAntennae.de: Craft hybrid humanoid / insectoid feeling appendages that can be implanted in a subject's head, completely modifying the way the subject "sees" and feels the surrounding world. The experience may be slightly overwhelming due to sensorial overload.
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftPsychicDampeners.des: Craft psychic dampeners, artificial hearing aids that block psychic emanations, providing considerable resistance to mechanoids' psychic attacks.
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftKidneyToxicFilters.d: Craft kidney toxic filters, bioelectronic kidney prosthesis that greatly improve the efficiency of the subject's kidneys by using insectoid tissue, providing resistence to toxic substances.
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftHumanThrumboHorn.des: A genetically modified thrumbo horn that can be implanted in a subject's forehead. Nasty.
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftThrumboSkin.label: Human Implant: thrumbo skin
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftThrumboSkin.descript: Craft thrumbo skin, a synthetic skin substitute that is much thicker and a much better insulator than human skin. This provides a lot of defense and makes the subject more resistant to extremes of temperature.
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftVenomousFangs.label: Human Implant: venomous fangs
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftVenomousFangs.descri: This hybrid implant substitutes the subject's jaw with a set of venomous fangs. Useful in combat, but not very comfortable.
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftIguanaScales.label: Human Implant: iguana scales
LanguageData.TribalGenetics_CraftIguanaScales.descrip: Craft iguana scales, a synthetic skin substitute that is much thicker and a much better insulator than human skin. This provides a measure of defense but, more importantly, makes the subject more resistant to high temperatures.
